get.description: Returns all of your customers. Results are paginated.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The zero-indexed starting point for paginated account requests sorted by account created date.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of accounts to be returned. Defaults to 100.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: A search query to be applied to results before the customers list is returned. Search by name, phone number, or SSN last-four digits.

parameters.name: effective_as_of_date
parameters.description: The `Date-Time` you would like the system to return the data as of. IE tell me what the customers were as if I had asked on `2020-10-20 00:00:00 EST`. If empty it defaults to current time.
